title: Drunken boat = Bateau ivre
creator_credit: Alfred Chaumel, Henri Beauvais and Franfilmdis
brief_description: After the poems of J. Arthur Rimbaud and the symphony “Bateau Ivre” by Robert Bergmann. Prelude for two voices Simon Gantillon and the voice of Rimbaud is Jean-Luis Barrault. In French with no English subtitles.
